meanings.sent1: The spider's bite was envenoming the poor victim.
meanings.sent2: The snake's venom was envenoming the prey slowly.
meanings.sent3: The potion the witch brewed ended up envenoming her own cat!
meanings.sent4: The dark magic of the curse was envenoming the entire kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The polluted water was envenoming the fish, turning them sickly.

meanings.definition: The act of poisoning or infecting with venom
meanings.sent1: The envenoming of the victim was evident from the snake bite marks.
meanings.sent2: The envenoming of the prey by the spider was swift and deadly.
meanings.sent3: The envenoming of the cake with too much sugar made it inedible.
meanings.sent4: The envenoming of the atmosphere with tension was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The envenoming of the relationship with lies led to its downfall.
